short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spin the bottle and let fate decide: a spontaneous kiss or a thrilling dare.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spin the bottle and let fate guide: a chance for a kiss or a wild dare! Challenge your friends with Spin the Bottle, the exciting Chrome extension for an unforgettable ride.

This is not just a game, it's a party starter, an icebreaker, a boredom buster right in your browser! 

Choose from four fabulous categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Spin the Bottle.

Add it to your Chrome now and let the good times roll!
